def_en: A closet is a piece of furniture with doors at the front and shelves inside, which is used for storing things.

def_cn: (尤指不带窗户的)小储藏间
def_en: A closet is a very small room for storing things, especially one without windows.

def_cn: (信仰、习惯、情感)隐蔽的，不公开的
def_en: Closet is used to describe a person who has beliefs, habits, or feelings which they keep secret, often because they are embarrassed about them. Closet is also used of their beliefs, habits, or feelings.
If someone comes out of the closet, they tell people that they are homosexual after having kept this a secret.

def_cn: 公开（或谈论）以前保密的事;(问题)公开
def_en: If someone comes out of the closet, they reveal or discuss something which they have previously kept secret. You can also say that an issue comes out of the closet when it starts to be publicly discussed.
closeted;   a skeleton in the closet→see: skeleton;
